books.title: The Trachiniae
books.author: Sophocles
books.summary: A woman unintentionally kills her demigod husband with a poisoned robe in a desperate attempt to reclaim his love.

books.title: The Return of Tarzan
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: Tarzan attempts to leave behind life in the jungle but rapidly discovers that life among humans contains just as many dangers.

books.title: My Reminiscences
books.author: Rabindranath Tagore
books.summary: Autobiographical sketches from the Bengali writer, poet, and artist Rabindranath Tagore.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: Peter and Wendy
books.author: J. M. Barrie
books.summary: A mischievous and cocky young boy, Peter Pan, takes Wendy and her brothers on adventures on a fantasy island consisting of mermaids, pirates, Native Americans, and fairies.

books.title: The Cherry Orchard
books.author: Anton Chekhov
books.summary: A heavily indebted landowner and her family return to Russia in an attempt to save her estate from being auctioned off.

books.title: Henry VI, Part III
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: Henry VI is overthrown and Edward Plantagenet becomes the new King of England.

books.title: Vathek
books.author: William Beckford
books.summary: A powerful caliph embarks on a quest to harness the powers of darkness.

books.title: Doctor Syn
books.author: Russell Thorndike
books.summary: A king’s enforcer searching for smugglers uncovers the dark past of the inhabitants of a small English town.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Arthur Machen
books.summary: A collection of nine short fiction works by influential supernatural and horror author Arthur Machen.

books.title: Now It Can Be Told
books.author: Philip Gibbs
books.summary: A British war correspondent recalls his experiences during the Great War.

books.title: The Mysterious Affair at Styles
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: A fastidious Belgian detective solves the mystery of a murder in an English country manor.

books.title: My Disillusionment in Russia
books.author: Emma Goldman
books.summary: Emma Goldman recounts her experiences living in the early Soviet Union.

books.title: The Social Contract
books.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
books.summary: Rousseau explores the political philosophy of authority originating from the consent of the people.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Frances Ellen Watkins Harper
books.summary: A collection of poems by Frances Ellen Watkins Harper.

books.title: The Mercy of Allah
books.author: Hilaire Belloc
books.summary: An entrepreneurial businessman satirically relates to his nephews how he became the wealthiest man in Baghdad.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Manly Wade Wellman
books.summary: A collection of horror and science fiction stories by Manly Wade Wellman.

books.title: The King in Yellow
books.author: Robert W. Chambers
books.summary: Ten short stories of madness, hauntings, romance, and art.

books.title: The Path to Rome
books.author: Hilaire Belloc
books.summary: Hilaire Belloc takes a walking pilgrimage to Rome from his hometown in France, writing of the journey, sketching the sights, and digressing on a wide variety of subjects.

books.title: Letters Written During a Short Residence in Sweden, Norway, and Denmark
books.author: Mary Wollstonecraft
books.summary: Mary Wollstonecraft’s account of her travels through Scandinavia.
